title: The Last Prophet
description: Librarian's note: This is an Alternate Cover Edition for ISBN10: 1505448859 ISBN13: 9781505448856.John awakes to find himself in a hospital bed with no memory of how he got there. Then the visions start. Destruction and death. A last chance. The only one who can save millions of people. He is no hero. Could he do what was being asked of him?
author: Tim  Heath
